articles.description: Listen to live commentary & follow text updates as China face England & Haiti take on Denmark in Group D of the 2023 Women's World Cup.
articles.title: Fifa Women's World Cup: Build-up as England face China

articles.description: Follow the latest transfer rumours as Bayern Munich continue Harry Kane pursuit, Chelsea are linked with Kylian Mbappe and Al-Hilal bid for Victor Osimhen.
articles.title: Transfer latest: Bayern 'hold Kane talks' with Spurs

articles.description: Defending champions the USA miss out on finishing top of Group E thanks to an uninspiring draw against debutants Portugal at the Women's World Cup.
articles.title: USA scrape through to last 16 with Portugal draw

articles.description: Esmee Brugts curls home a "sensational" third goal for the Netherlands in their Group E match against Vietnam at the Women's World Cup.
articles.title: Brugts scores 'sensational' third goal for Netherlands

articles.description: Mark Cavendish is "still thinking" about a Tour de France comeback, but he hasn't had an easy ride to this point.
articles.title: 'I don't want anyone to go through what I have'

articles.description: BBC pundits pick their favourite moments from this year's incredible Ashes series.
articles.title: BBC pundits pick their favourite Ashes moments

articles.description: Few England cricketers connect with a crowd like Stuart Broad. On the final day of the last Ashes Test he showed why we will miss him so much.
articles.title: 'Showman Broad gives us the feels one last time'

articles.description: Rate the players as England face China looking to reach the knockout stages at the Fifa Women's World Cup.
articles.title: Rate the players as England face China at World Cup

articles.description: England coach Brendon McCullum reiterates his wish for his side to stick to their attacking style after the drawn Ashes.
articles.title: McCullum praises England's 'refined' style

articles.description: Listen to BBC radio commentary from five games in the 2023 One-Day Cup.
articles.title: Listen: One-Day Cup - commentary from five games
